promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young epic chameleon fire-type pokemon holding a ornate whip. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyroscourge, a a chibi young epic chameleon fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Scorching Wing. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "fire" or "Pyroscourge". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, chameleon-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Living amidst molten landscapes, this tiny dynamo unfurls ember-coated wings to maintain heat, a captivating display of warm resilience.
